body:
Merry Christmas! ^.^ Here in New Zealand its now the 25th :D
Have Fun and Enjoy your time. I recommend taking time to spend with your family and get your festive spirits on :D

title: Merry Christmas Avicus! <3

replies.body: Merry Christmas to the whole of Avicus! You have been great throughout the year, whether its on the staff team or just in your playing. Here in  England its the 24th so I have to wait 1 more day! Have a great holiday everyone and a very Merry Christmas!
replies.body_tagged: Merry Christmas to the whole of Avicus! You have been great throughout the year, whether its on the staff team or just in your playing. Here in  England its the 24th so I have to wait 1 more day! Have a great holiday everyone and a very Merry Christmas!

replies.body: Merry christmas! It has been a ride this year, I am sure it has been for all of us. Best wishes, and once again, Merry Christmas! :)
replies.body_tagged: Merry christmas! It has been a ride this year, I am sure it has been for all of us. Best wishes, and once again, Merry Christmas! :)

replies.body:
On behalf of the Leadership team (Administrative team), the senior staff team, themoderator team and the map development team, we want to wish everyone a merry christmas and a happy new year! It's been a bumpy year for me, and I'm sure it was for all of you too. Thanks for such an amazing year, and hopefully 2015 brings a lot of new things!(Hype)

Once again, merry christmas Avicus!
